description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
role of the participant – focal_participant_left
name of the participant_2
age presented in years of the participant_2 – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant_2
role of the participant_2 – focal_participant_right
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee
name of the two participants that compose the dyad
training phase participants received prior to the test – 1 (individual) / 2 (dyadic)
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
the quantity of food in the non-social option -0/ 1/3/5
the position of the 5 items in the tray – free_exterior_side/ roped_interior_side
the position of the 1 items in the tray - free_exterior_side/ roped_interior_side
the choice the participant_right made – social/ non_social
the choice the participant_right made - social/ non_social
the latency in seconds of participant_right to slide the door to open the access to the social or non-social option / N = participant did not open any door.
the latency in seconds of participant_left to slide the door to open the access to the social or non-social option / N = when participant did not open any door.
latency in seconds to pull once a participant_right chose the social option/ NP = no pull.
latency in seconds to pull once a participant_left chose the social option/ NP = no pull.
the amount of rewards participant_right obtained
the amount of rewards participant_left obtained
